trans-unit.source: Represents a column of cells that contain links in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn> class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that respond to user clicks.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn> class is similar to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewButtonColumn> class but provides a different user experience that may be more appropriate in certain situations, such as displaying a URL stored in a database table.

To display the same link text for every cell, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property to `true` and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text%2A> property to the desired link text.
A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn> has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode.NotSortable>.
To respond to user link clicks, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> event.
You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick?displayProperty=fullName> event to respond to clicks anywhere in the cell.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn"></xref> class.

When initializing a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn> instance, this constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell> instance.
Gets or sets the color used to display an active link within cells in the column.

Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.ActiveLinkColor%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color used to display a link that is being selected.
The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the color of links in the hover state.
The value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate"></xref> property is `null`.
Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
The constructor for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn> class initializes this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell>.
Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.

These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
The default value is a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"></xref> instance.
When setting this property to a value that is not of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell"></xref>.
Creates an exact copy of this column.
Use this method to duplicate a column of link cells.
An <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn"></xref>.
The value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate"></xref> property is `null`.
Gets or sets a value that represents the behavior of links within cells in the column.

Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkBehavior%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior"></xref> value indicating the link behavior.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.LinkBehavior.SystemDefault"></xref>.
The value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate"></xref> property is `null`.
Gets or sets the color used to display an unselected link within cells in the column.

Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.LinkColor%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color used to initially display a link.
The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the link color.
The value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate"></xref> property is `null`.
Gets or sets the link text displayed in a column's cells if <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue"></xref> is `true`.
The text is visible if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property is set to `true`.
Otherwise, each cell's link text is populated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue%2A> property of each cell.

You can override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text%2A> property value for individual cells by setting the cell <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property to `false` after setting the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property to `true`.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> containing the link text.
When setting this property, the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate"></xref> property is `null`.
Gets a string that describes the column.
A <xref href="System.String"></xref> that describes the column.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the link changes color if it has been visited.

When <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.TrackVisitedState%2A> is true, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property value is used to display links that have already been visited.

Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.TrackVisitedState%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
`true` if the link changes color when it is selected; otherwise, `false`.
The default is `true`.
The value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate"></xref> property is `null`.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text"></xref> property value is displayed as the link text.

Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.UseColumnTextForLinkValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.

`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.Text"></xref> property value is displayed as the link text; `false` if the cell <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.FormattedValue"></xref> property value is displayed as the link text.
The default is `false`.
The value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate"></xref> property is `null`.
Gets or sets the color used to display a link that has been previously visited.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.TrackVisitedState%2A> property is set to false, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property is ignored.

Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkCell.VisitedLinkColor%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color used to display a link that has been visited.
The default value is the user's Internet Explorer setting for the visited link color.
The value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewLinkColumn.CellTemplate"></xref> property is `null`.
